column5: Big Cliff was gracious enough to take me out for a couple of mornings to coach me on his favourite summer Walleye techniques, fishing philosophies and overall profiling. I'm very grateful for Cliff's generosity and learned a lot from a seasoned Walleye fisherman.  Cliff hooked into some big ones, but the attached pic is the highlight of my outing. The picture does not do the fish justice!
You set it up beautifully......and then I saw the  picture LOL
What no link to Big Cliff's Guiding Service website?
Did you happen to tell him ya voted liberal in the last election??
Your supposed to hold it out  makes it look bigger
Release that baby very gently, just like in the fishing shows.
LOL well it was a record (but for the smallest walleye I have seen landed)!  Paul, I really enjoyed getting out with you and look forward to more opportunities!
At least you got him on to some fish Cliff!,what more could a fellow ask for? lol.I'm sure you guys had a good laugh!
Cliff is a so-so walleye guide.  Once he took me out and I caught a Muskie. Lol
you have yourself some competition.   To this day it is still the only pickerel my brother has ever caught in Ontario lol!
Cliff is a so-so walleye guide. Once he took me out and I caught a Muskie. Lol Ya, Stupid Muskie!!!!!! Anyone have a good recipe for pre slot walleye?
Ya, Stupid Muskie!!!!!! Anyone have a good recipe for pre slot walleye?  How come there is no emoticon for 'stirring the pot'?
How come there is not emoticon for 'stirring the pot'?
